auth.identification_required_note: You must identify with FranceConnect+ to accept or refuse this mail.
auth.terms_acceptance: By logging in, you accept our

form.file_type_error: File type not allowed. Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, ODT
form.file_size_error: File too large. Maximum size: 10 MB

delivery.new_delivery_description: Send an electronic registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt
delivery.recipient_email_hint: The recipient will receive a notification at this address
delivery.recipient_name_hint: This name will appear in generated proofs
delivery.subject: Subject
delivery.message_placeholder: Add a message to accompany your document...
delivery.document_upload_label: Click to select or drag and drop
delivery.document_upload_formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX or ODT (max. 10 MB)
delivery.delivery_type_standard_desc: Recipient has 15 days to accept or refuse
delivery.good_to_know_text: Once sent, you will receive a Deposit Proof certifying the exact date and time of sending. This proof has legal value in accordance with the Postal and Electronic Communications Code.
delivery.sender_hidden_note: In accordance with regulations (CPCE), the sender's identity will only be revealed after your acceptance or refusal.
delivery.withdrawal_deadline_note: After this deadline, the delivery will be considered neglected
delivery.accept_refuse_note: By accepting, you confirm having received this registered mail. A receipt proof will be generated. By refusing, a refusal proof will be issued.

pickup.title: Registered mail to collect
pickup.received_title: You have received an electronic registered mail
pickup.received_description: A registered mail with acknowledgment of receipt is waiting for you. Identify yourself to view the details.
pickup.eidas_compliance_note: This service complies with the European eIDAS regulation and the French Postal and Electronic Communications Code.

accepted.title: Registered mail accepted
accepted.accepted_message: You have accepted this registered mail. An acceptance proof has been generated.
accepted.proof_conservation_note: Your proofs are kept for at least 1 year in accordance with regulations. We recommend downloading a copy for your records.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Manage your electronic registered mail deliveries
dashboard.no_deliveries_description: You haven't sent any electronic registered mail yet.

admin.title: Administration
admin.dashboard_description: Supervision of the electronic registered mail service
admin.qualified_note: This service is qualified in accordance with the eIDAS regulation and registered with ANSSI.
admin.dev_note: This service is not qualified. Generated proofs have no legal value.
admin.audit_packs_description: Generate and download audit packs for regulatory compliance
admin.audit_reason_hint: Document the reason for this generation for traceability
admin.include_evidence_desc: All evidence events within the period
admin.no_audit_packs_desc: Generate your first audit pack for compliance
admin.audit_pack_info_1: Audit packs contain evidence, logs, and configurations for a given period.
admin.audit_pack_info_2: Hash chain integrity is automatically verified.
admin.audit_pack_info_3: Keep these packs for eIDAS compliance audits.
admin.config_description: Manage configuration snapshots and change history
admin.no_active_config_desc: Create a configuration snapshot and activate it.
admin.make_active_hint: The current snapshot will be deactivated
admin.config_info_1: Snapshots capture the configuration state at a given moment.
admin.config_info_2: Each change is tracked for compliance audit.
admin.config_info_3: Only one snapshot can be active at a time.
admin.access_reviews_description: Review role assignments and account activity
admin.inactive_alert_message: The following accounts have not been used for more than {days} days
admin.inactive_threshold_hint: Period without activity to flag an account as inactive
admin.access_review_info_1: Regularly review role assignments for compliance.
admin.access_review_info_2: Inactive accounts should be reviewed and potentially disabled.
admin.access_review_info_3: All exports are tracked in security logs.

verification.page_description: Verify the authenticity of an electronic registered mail proof
verification.proof_id_hint: The identifier can be found on your proof document
verification.verification_token_hint: The verification token accompanies the identifier on your proof
verification.signature_valid: The cryptographic signature and timestamp are valid
verification.verification_failed_default: The proof could not be verified
verification.step1_desc: On your PDF proof, find the identifier and verification token at the bottom of the document.
verification.step2_desc: Enter the identifier and token in the form above.
verification.step3_desc: The cryptographic verification confirms the authenticity and integrity of the proof.
verification.eidas_cpce_compliance: This service complies with the eIDAS regulation and CPCE.

qualification.dev_warning: This service is not qualified. Generated proofs have no legal value.
qualification.dev_warning_eidas: This service is not eIDAS qualified. Generated proofs have no legal value.

footer.description: Qualified Electronic Registered Delivery Service compliant with the eIDAS regulation and the Postal and Electronic Communications Code.

pdf.name: Name
pdf.subject: Subject
pdf.verification_info: To verify the authenticity of this document, use the QERDS verification service with the identifier
pdf.dev_warning: WARNING: This document was generated in development mode and has no legal value. It does not constitute a qualified proof under the eIDAS regulation.

email.notification_subject: You have received an electronic registered mail
email.deposit_confirmation_subject: Confirmation of deposit of your registered mail
email.acceptance_confirmation_subject: Your registered mail has been accepted
email.refusal_notification_subject: Your registered mail has been refused
